name: DarkPulse for TriPulse - Version 1.5
description: This is a customised theme for TriPulse - created by Aryll Fae.
additional_info:
Changelog:

Release 1.5 - 10:59 AM EST on 9/7/2015
- More bugfixes
- Dropdown menu fixed
- Some dialogues have been tweaked

Release 1.4 - 12:08 PM EST on 8/30/2015
- BUTTOOONNSSSSSSSS
- More bugfixes
- Announcement Bar recoloured
- Forum Description fixed

Release 1.3 - 12:28 AM EST on 8/29/2015
- Many bugfixes have been implemented
- Loadtimes are improved
- REALLY fixed the longtext editor
- Experimented with SoundCloud embeds

Release 1.2 - 12:05 PM EST on 8/28/2015
- Fixed the new spoilers
- Desaturated link colours
- Fixed thread creation box

Release 1.1 - 3:55 AM EST on 8/27/2015
- Shoutbox text input color has been fixed
- Dropdown box has begun overhaul
- Fancybox (displaybox) has been fixed
- Added a fancy grey scrollbar
- A handful of bugfixes have been implemented
